mapper.insert: insert into comment (cafeName, menuName, detailName, contents, uid) values (#{cafeName},#{menuName},#{detailName}, #{contents},#{uid})
mapper.delete: delete from comment where commentNum=#{commentNum} and uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: select * from comment where cafeName=#{cafeName} and menuName=#{menuName} and detailName=#{detailName}
select count(*) from comment where commentNum=#{commentNum} and uid=#{uid}
